#START-FILE-LIST
# File List auto generated by waf2cmake.py, do not modify manually.

start_sources()
# -- MFCToolsPlugin.waf_files --
sources_platform(ALL)
add_sources("NoUberFile"
	SOURCE_GROUP "Controls"
		"Controls/TemplDef.h"
	SOURCE_GROUP "Root"
		"MFCToolsPlugin.cpp"
		"MFCToolsPlugin.h"
		"StdAfx.h"
		"StdAfx.cpp"
		"MFCUtil.h"
		"MFCUtil.cpp"
)

end_sources()
#END-FILE-LIST

CryEngineModule(MFCToolsPlugin EDITOR_COMPILE_SETTINGS PCH "StdAfx.cpp" SOLUTION_FOLDER "Sandbox/Plugins")

target_compile_definitions(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE
	-DPLUGIN_EXPORTS
	-DNOT_USE_CRY_MEMORY_MANAGER
)
target_link_libraries(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE EditorCommon)

use_xt()
